Summary / Title: Verify data accuracy in Payment Details modal
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Payment Details modal
2. Review "Subscribed By" and dates
Expected Result: The Payment Details modal should display the actual subscription purchase date and time.
Actual Result: It shows the current time instead of the actual purchase time

Summary / Title: Unavailable videos displayed while creating a Video Challenge
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Dashboard page.
2. Click on the  "Create Video Challenge" card.
Expected Result:
When clicking "Create Video Challenge", few working links shows unavailable video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WioL50vGE04 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X37crY4O7yc&t=1s
Actual Result: All available video links should load and play correctly when initiating a Video Challenge.
Remarks / Notes: The person who uploaded the video turned off embedding, so the video can't be played.

Summary / Title: The Dojo name/title is displayed the same as the first dojo in the list for all other dojos. Regardless of which dojo is selected, the title does not update and continues to show the first dojo's name.
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to the Discover page.
2. Create multiple Dojos (at least 4â€“5), choosing from any Sifus.
3. Ensure that each Dojo is created using different modes (use all three available modes across the different Dojos).
4. After creating the Dojos, navigate to the Filter/Dropdown section.
5. Select Quiz Only and then Video Only to filter the Dojos.
6. Click on the Status bar options (Active / Inactive) to further filter the list.
7. Then click on all the Dojos from the list and observe the title name
Expected Result: The title/name should be displayed as per the selected dojo, and it's orignal name title
Actual Result:
There appears to be an issue within the Dojo. Although the exact steps to reliably reproduce the issue are not yet confirmed, it has been observed by two team members.

The issue is that regardless of which dojo is selected, the title name remains the same. Even after refreshing the page, the title does not update and continues to display the incorrect name.
Remarks / Notes:
Since the issue cannot be consistently replicated and the steps to reproduce are not confirmed, the priority has been set to Low for now.

Please refer to the Screenrecord for the issue reference.
 Dojo.webm

Summary / Title: Dojos Page Not Reloading from Navigation
Description / Steps to Reproduce: 1. Click on the Dojos" icon in the left sidebar to load the Dojos page.

Bug ID: 2. Wait until the Dojos page is fully loaded.
3. Click on the "Dojos" icon again to refresh or reopen the main dojo page."
Test Case ID: The Dojo page should be refreshed after clicking "Dojo" from the navigation bar same as we refresh it from the browser
Date Reported:
Search for any dojo that you haven't created and try to click on "Dojos" from navigation
The page does not reload as it does not change but when refreshed rom the broswer itslef the  main dojo page appears

Summary / Title: Blogs Link Redirects to Wrong Section
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to the Home page.
2. Click on the "Sifu Scroll" link in the header.
3. Click on the "Blogs" from the dropdown
Expected Result: Clicking on Blogs should redirect the user to the Blog section, not the Stories from the Dojo section.
Actual Result:
After clicking Blgs it should redirect to the Blog section, but currently it redirects to the
STORIES FROM THE DOJO section.

Description / Steps to Reproduce:

2. Enter invalid name format (Aavash 67").

Test Case ID: Since special characters are already restricted in usernames, numeric-only usernames should also be restricted.
Date Reported: User name like "12345" is also being registered

Summary / Title: Learn More button misaligned on minimized display
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click on "Sifu Scroll"
2. Click on "Stories"
3. Observe the alignment of the Learn More" button."
Expected Result: The "Learn More" button should remain properly aligned regardless of display size.
Actual Result: When the display size is minimized, the "Learn More" alignment needs to be corrected.

Module / Component: KFQ - Discover>Around the Kung Fu Arena>Video Challenges
Summary / Title: Screen flickers when switching between Video and Quiz Challenges filters
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click the "All" button at the top of the section.
2. Verify both Video and Quiz-only challenges are visible in the grid.
Expected Result: When switching between Video Challenges and Quiz Challenges filters, the content should update immediately without any screen flickering, and the filtered challenges should be displayed correctly
Actual Result: The screen flickers for a few seconds when clicking on Video Challenges or Quiz Challenges before the filtered content is displayed.
